previewArticle.title: Brazil vs. Netherlands: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Third Place Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Brazil 0, Netherlands 3: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Third-Place Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: In Related News
timelineItems.text: The 3rd place match has to be the most anticlimactic sporting event in all of sports. Well, that and the #NFL All-Star game. #BRAvNED

timelineItems.comment: Oscar (Brazil) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Stefan de Vrij (Netherlands).

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: PSG fans have to be excited about the chance to watch this central defense together for an entire year.

timelineItems.name: AJLeeUKWidows
timelineItems.text: Oscar was knocked over purposely we should've had a free kick! #BRAvNED #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Ramya Karthik
timelineItems.text: The Dutch are flying all over the place! #BRAvNED

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Oscar (Brazil).

timelineItems.name: Euan Greenoak
timelineItems.text: Why do the Brazilian fans love David Luiz so much? #bizarre #BRAvNED

timelineItems.name: Barry Spruce
timelineItems.text: David Luiz is Portuguese for Headless Chicken #BRAvNED #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Church of Soccer
timelineItems.text: Reminder: FIFA Laws of the Game contemplate fouls starting outside of the box & continuing inside. In those cases, it’s a PK. #BRAvNED

timelineItems.name: Lily-May Wray

timelineItems.name: Tombodinho

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: David Luiz! #BRA gonna cough up another touchdown.

timelineItems.name: stephen

timelineItems.name: Davin O'Dwyer
timelineItems.text: Given Silva & Luiz’s recent form, PSG, Zlatan & co must be a leeeeetle bit anxious about their defensive solidity next season… #BRAvNED

timelineItems.name: The Grimm Reaper™
timelineItems.text: Sorry Brazil not your year! #BraVNed!!!

timelineItems.comment: David Luiz (Brazil) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Joel Horwood
timelineItems.text: 7 - 1 my prediction #BRAvNED

timelineItems.name: Chris Roche

timelineItems.name: Karl Lawsön

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Brazil 0, Netherlands 3.

Attempt blocked. Maicon (Brazil) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Luiz Gustavo.

timelineItems.text: It's not supposed to be THIS easy against Brazil, is it? #BRAvNED

timelineItems.text: If Brazil loses this, they can't blame anyone than themselves. Step up to the challenge and take it. The Dutch have pride too. #BRAvNED

Georginio Wijnaldum (Netherlands) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.text: Here we go guys, the demolition begins. #BRAvNED

timelineItems.text: Oh my gosh they're actually stapling his head on the sidelines. #WorldCup2014 #BRAvNED

timelineItems.name: Roger Sterling
timelineItems.text: I don’t know what’s worse. FIFA’s policy with concussions or allowing this carnage to continue. #BRAvNED

timelineItems.name: Sal Cipriano
timelineItems.text: Anybody know if @CillessenJasper is sick? Complexion/gait looks terrible. #BRAvNED

timelineItems.name: Robert Obonyo
timelineItems.text: This is the worst Brazilian outfit since 1990. They should have gone out in round one. #SSFootball, #BRAvNED, BBCWorldcup, #BRA

timelineItems.name: fidel emone
timelineItems.text: RVP has the opportunity of winning the Golden Boot. It's Brazil, score as much as you wish #BRAvNED

timelineItems.name: The Sports Bar
timelineItems.text: Arjen Robben continues to get quicker in his old age, in about 3 years he will never need to dive #BRAvNED

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Brazil 0, Netherlands 2.

timelineItems.name: Bogolo Kenewendo
timelineItems.text: Supporting Brazil at this point is like supporting Tom in Tom&Jerry...You know the cat never wins! #BRAvNED

timelineItems.name: Sarith Ranawaka
timelineItems.text: Brazil managing to somehow overcomplicate each of their attacks, while Netherlands make full use of the subsequent counterattack. #BRAvNED
